title: Green Man: Festival returns in the Welsh mountains after Covid restrictions
description: Wales' largest music festival, Green Man, returns with 25,000 people in attendance.

title: 'Race should not be a factor in my destiny'
description: A young Londoner beats 23,000 other entrants in one of the country's largest anti-racism competitions.

title: Kenya holds biggest ever animal census
description: All wildlife on land and sea is being counted to help Kenya's conservation plans and tourism.

title: Kenya holds biggest ever animal census
description: All wildlife on land and sea is being counted to help Kenya's conservation plans and tourism.

title: The NI inventor who saved thousands of lives
description: The plane ejector seat was invented by James Martin, from Crossgar in County Down, in 1944.

title: Algeria's desperate wildfire fight: Buckets and branches
description: Despite a huge military budget, oil-rich Algeria is ill-equipped to tackle annual fires.

title: Dorothy Butler Gilliam: 'I am not a maid, I am a reporter'
description: The first black female reporter on the Washington Post says some colleagues would pretend not to know her.

title: Match of the Day analysis: How Danny Ings scored his 'fabulous' bicycle kick for Aston Villa
description: Match of the Day's Gary Lineker, Jermaine Jenas and Danny Murphy analyse Danny Ings' "fabulous" bicycle kick for Aston Villa in their 2-0 win over Newcastle United.

title: Hurricane Grace kills eight as it rips through eastern Mexico
description: The powerful storm brings torrential rain and high winds, causing power cuts and flooding.

title: 10.54 - Thompson-Herah runs second-fastest women's 100m of all time
description: Olympic champion Elaine Thompson-Herah runs the second fastest time in women's 100m history as she clocks 10.54 seconds in Eugene.

title: Inspired Invincibles crush Brave to win women's Hundred
description: Oval Invincibles storm to an emphatic 48-run victory over favourites Southern Brave to become the first women's Hundred champions on a historic afternoon at Lord's.

title: The Hundred Final - Southern Brave v Oval Invincibles: Marizanne Kapp dismisses Danni Wyatt, Sophia Dunkley & Gaby Lewis in just six deliveries
description: Watch as Oval Invincibles' Marizanne Kapp dismisses Southern Brave's Danni Wyatt, Sophia Dunkley & Gaby Lewis all for ducks in just seven deliveries.

title: Grealish scores on home debut as Man City rout Norwich
description: Manchester City's £100m man Jack Grealish scores on his home debut as the reigning Premier League champions thrash Norwich.

title: Westminster double murder: Police say wanted man knew victims
description: Detectives want to trace Lee Peacock after two people were found dead with knife injuries in London.

title: Afghanistan: Ex-marine in talks with UK over staff exit from Kabul
description: Pen Farthing, who runs an animal charity, warns the crisis in Afghanistan "is getting out of control".

title: Nigeria's royal wedding: Private jets, glitz and glamour
description: President Buhari's son marries the daughter of a religious leader in one of Nigeria's events of the year.

title: Women's Open: Scottish amateur Louise Duncan converts a long putt for birdie
description: Scottish amateur Louise Duncan converts a long putt for birdie on the 15th as she continues her impressive performance at the Women's Open at Carnoustie.

title: Banksy: Rusty old boat a 'godsend' destined for museum
description: The small metal "boat" under a painting of three children could become a museum piece.

title: Hillsborough: Minute's applause for 97th victim
description: Liverpool fans chanted "Justice for the 97" after the death of Andrew Devine who was hurt in the 1989 crush.

title: Only Fools and Horses garage door sold to TV fan
description: The garage door was sold to a TV memorabilia fan who hopes to get it displayed in a museum.

title: Covid: Australian police clash with anti-lockdown protesters
description: Hundreds of people are arrested after rallies against lockdown measures in Melbourne and Sydney.

title: Puppy smuggling: Rise in cases prompts new welfare rules
description: Ministers want to stop the "grim trade" in criminals profiting from the rise in demand for pets.

title: Mission: Impossible films Derbyshire quarry train crash
description: Crews had been building the set for months and the nearby village had seen lorry-loads of props appearing.

title: R. Kelly aide says he paid bribe for singer to marry Aaliyah
description: An ex-tour manager for the singer testifies that he obtained a fake ID for then 15-year-old Aaliyah.

title: Biden's week of blame and tumult after Kabul fall
description: How the fall of Kabul stunned the Biden administration and spawned the worst week of his presidency.

title: The pregnant woman who caught a serial voyeur masseur
description: How a suspicious-looking alarm clock led to the downfall of a masseur who was spying on his clients.
